CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1962, page 1, reads: "For Drafts Fund - William (Bill) Powell, WAMO disc jockey, is shown turning over $638.85 to Mrs. Robert L. Vann, president and treasurer of The Pittsburgh Courier, which initiated a drive to aid Charles (Buggsy) Drafts. The money was raised at an all-night gospel sing at Calvary Baptist Church, which Powell emceed. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jessie Vann and disc jockey William Powell holding money in front of WAMO microphone in office interior
